article_title: U.S. Retail Sales Fell 0.1% in February
article_text:
American consumers are showing renewed signs of caution amid continued financial-market volatility, clouding the outlook for a segment of the economy that had been a bright spot.

U.S. retail sales fell in February and figures for January were revised down sharply amid a drop in spending on gasoline and autos, according to Commerce Department...

twitter.description: U.S. retail sales fell in the opening months of the year amid lower auto and gasoline sales, highlighting consumer caution amid volatility in financial markets.
twitter.creator: @jeffsparshott
